rules_text:
When Ramhead Crasher enters, it fights up to one target creature you don’t control.
Suspend 3–{1}{R}{R} [i](Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {1}{R}{R} and exile it with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, you may cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.)[/i]
